zone.line: purpose touch upon
present enquiry to in into the evil produced
by these systems: except that we protest,
on the ground of the principles already
established, that no portion of it can be
imputed to the poetry they contain.—
It is probable that the astonishing
poetry of Moses, Job, Solo David, Solomon
& Isaiah had produced a great effect upon
the mind of Jesus & his disciples. The
sca scattered fragments preserved to us
by the biographers of this extraordinary
-nary person are all instinct with the
most vivid poetry. But his doctrines
seem to have been quickly distorted.
At a certain period after the prevalence
doctrines founded upon those promulgated by him
of the comments of his disciples upon them,
into
the three forms under which Plato
had distributed the faculties of mind
underwent a sort of apotheosis, & became
the object of the worship of Europe.
Here, it is to be confessed that
"Light seems to thicken, and the crow
Makes wing to the rooky wood
